subject: Basketball
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A festival of fouls, some flagrant, in the Heat-Pacers game. A much-discussed hit in the Kings-Coyotes game. Sometimes, it hurts to watch.
snippet: A festival of fouls, some flagrant, in the Heat-Pacers game. A much-discussed hit in the Kings-Coyotes game. Sometimes, it hurts to watch.
